item.title: Wendy add a quote by Leonard Cohen
item.description: "There is a crack in everything. That's how the light gets in." -- Leonard Cohen

item.title: Wendy add a quote by Leonard Cohen
item.description: "From bitter searching of the heart, quickened with passion and with pain we rise to play a greater part this is the faith from which we start." -- Leonard Cohen

item.title: Wendy add a quote by Edward Abbey
item.description: "We can have wilderness without freedom; we can have wilderness without human life at all, but we cannot have freedom without wilderness, we cannot have freedom without leagues of open space beyond the cities, where boys and girls, men and women, can live at least part of their lives under no control but their own desires and abilities, free from any and all direct administration by their fellow men." -- Edward Abbey
